chapters.title: Chapter 17: A Bronze Bear
chapters.info: Elvaine Martan, p. 365—Wife of Brannin, head of a minor house in Andor. Their manor is not much grander than a large farmhouse. It is home to generations; a third of their armsmen are actually his sons, grandsons, nephews, and great-nephews. See also Martan, Brannin.
